Onlinehandel

All Classes

Class Description
Costumer
A Costumer in the Onlinehandel.

Skeleton implementation - no argument checking.
DateTime
A UTC point in time.
InterationalOrder
An international order within the Onlinehandel.

For international orders a factor can be set that is used to calculate customs when crossing borders.

This factor is applied to the items' total value when calculating the total of an international order.
Item
An item within the Onlinehandel.

An item consists of one or many identical single items with a common description a single item value.
Main
Onlinehandel demo application
Matcher<T>
a matcher interface.

Matchers are used for filtering operations.
OnRouteMatcher
Matcher to test if an order is currently on route.
Order
An order within the Onlinehandel.

An order holds information on the costumer placing the order, the items ordered and the status of the order which captures collection and delivery date and time.

The usual life cycle is create an order with id, costumer and at least one item add items collect deliver
RegionalOrder
A regional order within the Onlinehandel.

For regional orders an express option can be set.
